parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Sides

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Count how many units in the array are considered friendly to the given unit.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> unitName '''countFriendly''' arrayName

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unitName: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> arrayName: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_num = [[player]] [[countFriendly]] [[list]] _triggerOne;</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[count]], [[countEnemy]], [[countUnknown]], [[countSide]], [[countType]]
</value></part></template>

<dl class="command_description">
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment>
<dd class="notedate">Posted on August 3, 2006 - 14:28</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Hardrock|hardrock]]<dd class="note">''Notes from before the conversion:''

The countFriendly command seem to count the number of units from the array that are considered to be of the given type by the whole side, not just the specified unit.


<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>
